titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [22. 2. 1932]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 185; Cambridge Letters, S. 253).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I cann't come to tea with you tomorrow as I go to London to see the French Exhibition. Some people are taking me there in their car. I look forward hearing you on Friday. I'm sorry I wasn't well enough to hold my class last Friday.
